2.2 File encoding: UTF-8:

{

    "Configuration":

    </module>"
}

{

4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='TEXT'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_FOR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>

    </module>"
}

{

}

4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='NoLineWrap'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_NEW, METHOD_CALL, METHOD_REF, ARRAY_INIT, EXPR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, SEMI'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.1 Vertical Whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, VARIABLE_DEF, CTOR_DEF, METHOD_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_CATCH'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_CATCH'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='QUESTION, COLON, LAMBDA, BAND, BOR, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR, BSR_ASSIGN, BSL, BSL_ASSIGN, BXOR, BXOR_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, SL, SL_ASSIGN, GE, GT, LE, LT, INSTANCEOF, NOT_EQUAL, EQUAL, LOR, LAND, BNOT, UNARY_MINUS, UNARY_PLUS, INC, DEC, POST_INC, POST_DEC, DOT, METHOD_REF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='RPAREN, SEMI, COMMA, DOT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='TYPE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LBRACE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='RBRACE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='LBRACKET'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAfter'>
        <property name='tokens' value='RBRACKET'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.6.1 Block comment style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='CommentsIndentation'>
        <property name='eachLine' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreEmpty' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='BLOCK_COMMENT, LINE_COMMENT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='ModifierOrder'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
    </module>"
}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='allowClasses' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowInterfaces' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEnums' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowAnnotations' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.4 Constant names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='ConstantName'>
        <property name='format' value='UPPER_SNAKE_CASE'/>
        <property name='ignoreScope' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMutableConstants' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowNonFinalConstants' value='false'/>
        <property name='nameFormat' value='^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.6 Parameter names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='ParameterName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='allowOneCharMethods' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.8 Type variable names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration": 
    "<module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*T$'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
6.2 Caught exceptions: not ignored:
{
